36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Cursed be the slave of the Dinar, cursed be the slave of the Dirham

chapter.eng-name: Regarding What Has Been Related About The Slave Of The Dinar And The Slave Of The Dirham
